description:
Comprehensive legal representation

As a full-service law firm, Kennedy Berkley Yarnevich & Williamson provides representation to people in Salina, Kansas, in matters, including personal injury, employment law, family law, estate planning and Social Security Disability. We were founded in 1961 and have since expanded to have four offices - including those in Overland Park and Garden City - serving people throughout Saline, Johnson, Finney and Ellis counties, as well as all of Kansas, and surrounding states.

Choosing dedicated legal professionals

Our law firm is nothing if not proactive, results-oriented professionals. Acting quickly and knowledgeably is essential in any type of legal situation. After all, someone's finances, relationships and future may be on the line. We are committed to working closely with our clients to determine the best course of action, whether we are drafting a will or a trust, or examining a banking transaction. Our attorneys are also known for the following:

  • Being actively involved with the industries we serve
  • Using cutting edge technology and resources
  • Building solid relationships with our clients

Everyone who comes to our law firm presents a unique set of circumstances. As such, we customize the solutions we develop to meet each individual's needs. Having decades of experience also means that our team has the flexibility to change course when necessary in order to best serve our clients. In some cases, we may be able to resolve an issue without going to court. In others, we are skilled litigators who excel in trial. Kennedy Berkley Yarnevich & Williamson accepts credit cards.
